name: Don't Break The SandBox
description:
Don't Break The SandBox !!!

A Game Made for the FridayNightGameJam22 in 3h.

It's a game where you hold a box made of sand "SandBox", every time you hit something with it the box break (not a good box for store thing's). Try to take it to the flag.

Made by

Kapris Dimitri
